segment.source: Creating a Template and Setting a Default Template
segment.target: Creating a Template and Setting a Default Template

segment.source: Creating a Template and Setting a Default Template
segment.target: Creating a Template and Setting a Default Template

segment.source: Creating a Template and Setting a Default Template
segment.target: Creating a Template and Setting a Default Template

segment.source: Creating a template enables you to save all the settings of a particular version of a Group Policy Object (GPO) to use as a starting point for creating new GPOs.
segment.target: Creating a template enables you to save all the settings of a particular version of a Group Policy Object (GPO) to use as a starting point for creating new GPOs.

segment.source: As an Editor, you can also specify which of the available templates will be the default template for all Group Policy administrators creating new GPOs.
segment.target: As an Editor, you can also specify which of the available templates will be the default template for all Group Policy administrators creating new GPOs.

segment.source: Some potential uses for a template include the following:
segment.target: Some potential uses for a template include the following:

segment.source: Create a security baseline that your organization can reuse across domains.
segment.target: Create a security baseline that your organization can reuse across domains.

segment.source: Create a template to manage folder redirection and offline files that your organization can customize for each department.
segment.target: Create a template to manage folder redirection and offline files that your organization can customize for each department.

segment.source: Create a wireless networking template that your organization can use to configure wireless network connections for different geographical areas.
segment.target: Create a wireless networking template that your organization can use to configure wireless network connections for different geographical areas.

segment.source: Create regulatory compliance templates for local network administrators.
segment.target: Create regulatory compliance templates for local network administrators.

segment.source: Create a read-only snapshot of an existing GPO.
segment.target: Create a read-only snapshot of an existing GPO.

segment.source: A template is a static version of a GPO that cannot be edited, yet can be used as a starting point for creating new, editable GPOs.
segment.target: A template is a static version of a GPO that cannot be edited, yet can be used as a starting point for creating new, editable GPOs.

segment.source: Renaming or deleting a template does not affect GPOs created from that template.
segment.target: Renaming or deleting a template does not affect GPOs created from that template.
